segments.text: Mom , are those tattoos on your brows ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Moooooommmmm ! You're so in ! Anything else you've been keeping from me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Any body piercing ? Stick out your tongue !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , for Pete's sake . This is cosmetic . My brows are falling out . I did this for convenience .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Come on mom . I'm your A ! Wait till the guys hear about this !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mike , don't even think about it !
segments.speaker: S2
